products.name: Room 1
products.description: House located on bank of river "Mtkvari", 2 min. walk to "Dry bridge" flea market of Antiques, 2min. to most popular walking area, 5min. to "Rustaveli" avenue. Wine bars, cafes, Taverns & Restaurants are 2min. walk. We offer a 24H transfer from the airport to the house.
